markdownRemark.html:
Sometimes we too focus on problems. You should know that it doesn't make any sense. Your current problem is not the first one and most likely, not the last one. This world is full of problems, but you don't notice that because you too focus on your problems.

Don't focus on problems, focus on solutions.

frontmatter.title: Come with solutions, not with problems
